title: express
text: Express.js is a popular web application framework for Node.js.

title: OOP
text: Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) is a programming paradigm that organizes code around objects and their interactions.

title: Nodejs
text: Node.js is an open-source, server-side runtime environment built on the V8 JavaScript engine. It allows you to run JavaScript code on the server, outside of a web browser, and enables you to build scalable and high-performance applications.
